title: Blogging App
description: Designed and developed a full-stack blog application using React, Node.js, and MySQL featuring authentication with JWT securing login/logout functionality, and content management.

title: Food Recipe App
description: Developed a dynamic web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and utilized TheMealDB API to search recipes, display meal details, and offer random meal suggestions.

title: 2-Player Fighting Game
description: Implemented a 2D 2-player fighting game using HTML, CSS and JavaScript, incorporating gravity and collision detection for realistic gameplay.
